Package de.fhe.ai.model

Class Connection

java.lang.Object
de.fhe.ai.model.ModelBase
de.fhe.ai.model.Traversable
de.fhe.ai.model.Connection
public class Connection
extends Traversable
A class that represents a one-directional connecton between two Stations

  • Constructor Details

    • Connection

      public Connection​(int id, EventManager eventManager, TrafficManager trafficManager, Station sourceStation, Station destinationStation, float length, int maxWeight, float trafficFactor)
      Initializes a new Connection
      Parameters:
      id - the internal id of the connection
      eventManager - the eventManager used to communicate with the TrafficManager, must be non-null
      sourceStation - the source station, must be non-null
      destinationStation - the destination station, must be non-null
      length - the length of the connection in km, must be above 0
      maxWeight - the maximum allowed weight of a traverser, must be above 0
      trafficFactor - the traversion factor, must be between 0 and 1.0f
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if invalid arguments are passed

  • Method Details

    • getSourceStation

      public Station getSourceStation()

    • getDestinationStation

      public Station getDestinationStation()

    • isReverse

      public boolean isReverse​(Connection otherConnection)
      Checks whether a given connection is a reverse of this connection
      Parameters:
      otherConnection - the other connection to check for
      Returns:
      true if the given connecion is a reverse of this connection; otherwise false
